NEUTRAL.NAME: Vhoul Assasin
NEUTRAL.BIO: The Vhoul Assassin camp is a small camp of Neutral creeps. It contains 3 Vhoul Assassins, and gives a total of 123 experience and 63-87 gold.

NEUTRAL.NAME: Mud Golem
NEUTRAL.BIO: The Golem camp is a medium camp of Neutral creeps. It contains 2 Mud Golems, and gives a total of 176 experience and 108-124 gold.

NEUTRAL.NAME: Satyr Tormenter
NEUTRAL.BIO: The Large Satyr camp is a large camp of Neutral creeps. It contains 1 Satyr Banisher, 1 Satyr Mindstealer and 1 Satyr Tormenter, and gives a total of 222 experience and 139-161 gold. It is similar to the Satyr Camp, which does not contain a Satyr Tormenter.

NEUTRAL.NAME: Roshan
NEUTRAL.BIO: Roshan, sometimes also referred to as Roshan the Immortal, is the most powerful neutral creep in Dota 2. It is the first unit which spawns, right as the match is loaded and is the only npc which scales over time. During the early to mid game, it easily outmatches almost every hero in one vs one combat. Only very few heroes can take on him alone during the mid game, thanks to the nature of their skill set. Even in the late game, lots of heroes struggle fighting it one on one, since Roshan grows stronger as time passes.Roshan is not a creep which can just be farmed like the other neutral creep camps, fighting him is an important team decision, as it needs the correct timing and approach since it can decide the future of the match. Usually, it is fought as a team when it is safe to do so, meaning when the enemy team does not display a threat at the moment (for example after a successful team fight).
